function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Park use patterns are linked to park access and proximity, increasing the potential for contagious disease spread through crowded park use.","Impact":"Uncontrolled park use could lead to a higher risk of contagious disease transmission within park-goers and nearby communities.","Mitigation":"Implement capacity limitations, physical distancing measures, and sanitation protocols in parks to reduce the risk of disease spread.","Technologies":"Public health apps for monitoring park capacity, smart sanitation systems for automated cleaning, and geofencing for crowd control.","People":"Park-goers, nearby communities, and individuals in close contact with park visitors.","Owner":"Local government authorities, park management organizations, and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Politically-driven variability in COVID-19 restrictions across municipalities in the state leads to inconsistent enforcement of guidelines, affecting disease control measures in parks.","Impact":"Inconsistent enforcement of guidelines may result in irregular adherence to safety protocols, increasing the risk of disease transmission in parks.","Mitigation":"Standardize and communicate uniform guidelines and regulations across all municipalities to ensure consistent enforcement of safety measures in parks.","Technologies":"Communication platforms for disseminating guidelines, geolocation tracking for compliance monitoring, and data analytics for assessing adherence.","People":"Municipalities, park management organizations, and park visitors.","Owner":"Public health agencies, local government authorities, and regional coordinating bodies."}]}
